channel.title: [Delta 317] Connection Issue [SOLVED]
channel.description:
Alright to start this. I'm not stupid. I know how to host and program deltas. I just would like to see if you can figure out why it won't work for me. I used [url=http://www.r u n e l o c u s .com/statuschecker.html]http://www.r u n e l o c u s .com/statuschecker.html[/url](put it together.) to see if my server is online, and it successfully connected and said it's good to go. I used [url=http://www.simpleportforwarding.com/]this[/url] to port forward and also check if it's online. And that came up positive. I also used [url=http://www.canyouseeme.org]this[/url] to check if my port was open, and it came up positive as well. I triple checked my no-ip address in my client and server to make sure there was no mistake. Now why can't I connect?
Notice I used 3, count em, different methods to make sure I port forwarded correctly and was actually visible.

item.title: [Delta 317] Connection Issue [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

lostmyphat:

Is your client connecting to the right port? Have you portfowarded through your firewall, and router?

Check, check, and check

Dunno what I did. But fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta 317] Connection Issue [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Is your client connecting to the right port? Have you portfowarded through your firewall, and router?

item.title: [Delta 317] Connection Issue [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

i edited my post, also try connecting to the computer ip instead of localhost if that doesn’t work

I was able to connect with literal localhost, 127.0.0.1 I never tried using my houses IP, because it would seem silly seeing as both this computer, and every other one in my house has the same IP.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta 317] Connection Issue [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I guess it depends how you’re trying to connect, care to share?

I have 2 computers. One is running the server (using as a 24/7 host) and the other is my computer I use normally (What I’m using to post this). I run the server on the hoster, make sure no-ip DUC is online, check that it’s ported. then come on here get run the client and no avail.
I do NOT use utorrent to open 43594, I opened it in firewall. Otherwise I never would have gotten a green light saying I ported correctly.

Read full topic
